questions.question: A state can contain one or more sub-state(s) within it
What does forking of several activities from a synchronization point indicate?

answers.a: All those activities should get executed one after another
answers.b: The activities can be performed in parallel
answers.c: One or more activities could be skipped

questions.question: A decision point in an activity diagram is a control wher

answers.b: Decision is taken whether a transition should happen
answers.c: A condition is checked and decided which activity should be performed next
